company_projects.title: Workplace Monitoring System
descriptions: Engineered a Safety Monitoring system processing 100 CCTV feeds simultaneously.
Implemented PPE, Slip/Fall, Smoke/Fire detection, and Person Reidentification with 93-98% accuracy using PyTorch.
Deployed inference scripts with Nvidia Triton, Docker, and FastAPI for scalability.

company_projects.title: 3D Body Measurement
descriptions: Led team to create a 3D Body Measurement system with 97% accuracy.
Used PyTorch, PyTorch3D, FlaskAPI, and React to derive measurements from single RGB image.
Deployed the system on the client's AWS infrastructure.

company_projects.title: Other Projects
descriptions: Created a 98%-accurate model for brick quality detection for General Shale.
Led a team to develop a cricket video analysis system aiding player's performance.
Designed models to analyze key metrics like angles, speed, pitch, bounce, and shot classification.

personal_projects.title: Medical Imaging
descriptions: Developed a system to segment brain, liver, and lung tumors with 95% accuracy using PyTorch and PyTorch3D.
Built ensemble models for diagnosing pneumonia and congenital heart disease.
Designed an API to process Nibabel/DICOM files and return detailed inference data.

personal_projects.title: Football Analysis
descriptions: Engineered a system to track players and ball, segregate teams using PyTorch, YOLO, and KNN.
Measured player speed with a moving camera using perspective transform algorithms.
Analyzed player activity and ball control during games using OpenCV and PyTorch.
